item.title: Demise shop
item.dc:creator: @Infinity_Zr Infinity Zr
item.description:
@Infinity_Zr wrote:

RE-adding the shops into demise source came across this code and im wondering is it the method for if you go over 1000 its turns it into infinity

[QUOTE]int ShopValue = (int) Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(
removeID, 1, removeSlot));
String ShopAdd = “”;

					if ((ShopValue >= 1000) && (ShopValue < 1000000)) {
						ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000) + "K)";
					} else if (ShopValue >= 1000000) {
						ShopAdd = " (" + (ShopValue / 1000000)
								+ " million)";
					}

[/QUOTE]

Read full topic
